name: 6 feet
description:
what is the easiest way to social distance? glue people's heads together with a pipe. bam. now they are 6 feet apart - but now you cant get the pipe off when they need to get home at the end of the day, and now you have to get it off before the sun goes down.

hello everyone! this is like my fourth, fifth? maybe sixth game. I had nothing to do this week so I decided the only rational thing to do is glue a few virtual people's heads together and make them try to escape a construction site.

first you must pass this test:

oof you failed.
